sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: During her short trip to the island together with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, Commission President Ursula von der Leyen promised that Lampedusa can count on the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But it's not clear how much of the plan can actually be executed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: One idea to expand the naval missions in the Mediterranean is ambiguous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the transfer of people out of Lampedusa to other EU member states using the voluntary solidarity mechanism appears complicated. The French interior minister already said that his country will not accept migrants from the island. Since June 2022, nearly 1,200 people have been relocated from Italy to other countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Humanitarian organizations are also raising concerns over some other points of the plan, like the introduction of the Geneva Convention, but also because we fear that there is not enough time, not enough situations that would allow asylum seekers to have time to explain their story, that their story is listened to.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Champions League returns as Paris Saint-Germain take on Borussia Dortmund at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday. The French Champions have a new leader in former Barcelona treble winner Luis Enrique,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: but their start to the season has been rocky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They have only gathered eight points out of 15 in Ligue 1 and sit fifth in the table, a far cry from their usual dominance and they will be up against a tough Dortmund side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Marco Reus' teammates are currently on a 13-match unbeaten streak, but are still seeking their first away clean sheet of the season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Both sides know they will have to get off to a good start if they want to qualify from Group F, considered by many as this year's group of death, with Newcastle and seven-time winners AC Milan also in the mix.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the other games, Atletico Madrid face a tough trip to Roma as Diego Simeone's men lock horns with Lazio. Elsewhere, Manchester City begin the defence of their European crown against Red Star Belgrade whilst young boys host RB Leipzig. In Group H, Barcelona will be looking to emulate their scintillating performance against Real Betis in La Liga when they face Belgian champions Royal Antwerp at the Mondraker Olympic Stadium.
